imdb.plot outline: Craig is a dancer by trade, and after a low ceiling fan accident that left him with half a scalp his choreographer/father (Mr. Max) left him. HIs mother, and one legged stripper, never wanted anything to do with him so he grew up alone in the dance studio where he was brought up. But then he started noticing that he had a special power. A power to reconnect people with their love of the dance. He has no idea how he got this power, or what he is supposed to do with it. So he set out to find his father to get some answers.
imdb.title: Dancer by Trade
plot: He's on a quest to find out why he got these very obscure powers, and the person who's got the answers could very well be dead by now. It doesn't matter, he'll keep looking and on the way he just might kick,ball, CHANGE some lives.

Craig is a dancer by trade, and after a low ceiling fan accident that left him with half a scalp his choreographer/father (Mr. Max) left him. HIs mother, and one legged stripper, never wanted anything to do with him so he grew up alone in the dance studio where he was brought up. But then he started noticing that he had a special power. A power to reconnect people with their love of the dance. He has no idea how he got this power, or what he is supposed to do with it. So he set out to find his father to get some answers.
